summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and regulating design, construction, use and occupancy of buildings, amending Sections 402, 1101, 3005, 3006, 4203 and Table 5-B of the Building Code (Ordinance 85500); repealing Sections 3801 to 3806 inclusive thereof and adding, in lieu of those repealed, new sections thereto designated Sections 3801 to 3806 inclusive; and further repealing Sections 4301 to 4307 inclusive and Tables No. 43-A. No. 43-B, No. 43-C, and No. 43-D thereof and adding, in lieu of those repealed, new sections thereto designated Sections 4301 to 4307 inclusive and new Tables No. 43-A, No. 43-B, No. 43-C, and No. 43-D.
